41
Friends of the Earth
Friends of the Earth strives for a more 
healthy and just world. The organization speaks truth to power and exposes those who endanger the health of people and the planet for corporate proﬁt. They organize to build long-term political power and campaign to change the rules of our economic and political systems that create injustice and destroy nature.Sustainability
Democratic National 
Committee (DNC)
The DNC is the oldest continuing 
political party committee in the United States. It is responsible for governing the Democratic Party, planning the Party’s presidential nominating convention and promoting the Democratic Platform.Political Organization
Habitat for Humanity 
NYC
Founded in 1984, New York City Habitat 
for Humanity aims to transforms lives by building quality homes for families in need and uniting all New Yorkers around the cause of aﬀordable housing.Nonprofit
American Federation of 
State, County, Municipal Employees (AFSCME)
The AFSCME has more than 1.6 million 
working and retired members who are nurses, corrections oﬃcers, childcare providers, EMTs, sanitation workersand more.Labor Union
Color of Change
Color of Change is the nation’s largest 
online racial justice organization. The organization helps people respond eﬀectively to injustice in the world around us.Social Justice
Eleven Madison Park
Eleven Madison Park is a ﬁne dining 
restaurant located in the heart of New York City. The restaurant overlooks one of the most beautiful parks in Manhattan, Madison Square Park, and sits at thebase of a historic Art Deco building onthe corner of 24th Street and Madison Avenue.Restaurant
